mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Qna_Reply(qna_id, user_id, qna_rep_content, qna_rep_parent, qna_rep_dep) VALUES (#{qna_id}, #{user_id}, #{qna_rep_content}, #{qna_rep_parent}, #{qna_rep_dep})
mapper.select: SELECT id, qna_id, user_id, qna_rep_content, qna_rep_inserted, qna_rep_parent, qna_rep_dep, CONCAT(qna_rep_parent, ",", id) lev FROM Qna_Reply WHERE qna_id = #{qna_id} ORDER BY lev

SELECT r.id, r.qna_id, r.user_id, r.qna_rep_content, r.qna_rep_inserted, r.qna_rep_parent, r.qna_rep_dep, CONCAT(r.qna_rep_parent, ",", r.id) lev, IF (u.user_id = #{user_id}, 1, 0) own FROM Qna_Reply r JOIN User u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE qna_id = #{qna_id} ORDER BY lev
